meanings.definition: Not arousing or stimulating sexual desire.
meanings.sent1: The unerotic movie put me to sleep.
meanings.sent2: The plain, unerotic painting failed to capture anyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The unerotic novel was so boring, it made me yawn.
meanings.sent4: The unerotic landscape was as dull as watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The unerotic atmosphere in the room was palpable, killing any romantic mood.

meanings.definition: Lacking any sexual or romantic appeal.
meanings.sent1: The unerotic date felt more like hanging out with a friend.
meanings.sent2: The unerotic love letter was sweet but lacked passion.
meanings.sent3: The unerotic comedy movie had us laughing at its lack of romance.
meanings.sent4: The unerotic setting of the play made the love story seem forced.
meanings.sent5: The unerotic melody failed to evoke any feelings of love or desire.
